New Records: CJ McCollum produced the fifth game of 50-plus points in 23 seasons of New Orleans basketball.
CJ McCollum nearly matched his own team record of 11 threes.
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum delivered 50 points in one of the greatest offensive performances in Pelicans history.
McCollum's performance featured 10 three-point baskets in 16 attempts.
The Pelicans won the game 132-120 over the Wizards.
McCollum's performance helped end an 11-game losing streak for the Pelicans.
Post-Match Reflections: Pelicans forward Trey Murphy expressed his admiration for McCollum's performance, calling it 'vintage CJ McCollum'.
Head coach Willie Green praised McCollum's performance, stating 'He was incredible tonight.'
McCollum reflected on his hard work and dedication, mentioning his motivation from his family.
